content: संदिग्ध {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Besmeared, covered. {@--2@} Dubious, doubtful, uncertain; as in संदिग्धमति --बुद्धि &c. {@--3@} Mistaken for or confounded with. {@--4@} Doubted, questioned. {@--5@} Confused, obscure, unintelligible (as a sentence). {@--6@} Dangerous, risky, unsafe. {@--7@} Envenomed. --ग्धं {@--1@} A doubt, uncertainty. {@--2@} Besmearing.
